'''Water-Retaining Flower Beds''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Water-Retaining Flower Beds is obtainable from the [[Realm Depot]] for {{Item|Realm Currency|24|x=160}}.

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=60}}.

|time = 14h
|Fir Wood = 12
|sort = Fir Wood
